description: Defines the application database for a personal expense tracking app using Room persistence library, including entities for transactions and budget goals, with seeding of sample data upon creation.

classes.name: AppDatabase
classes.description: Abstract class that defines the Room database which manages transaction and budget goal entities, including database creation and seeding logic.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Singleton method to obtain the database instance, creating and seeding the database if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: seed
methods.description: Seeds initial sample data into the database upon creation, including sample transactions and budget goals.
